name: PlowzandMowz
0:
”Alexa, ask plowz and mowz”
”Alexa, ask plowz and mowz to mow my lawn”
”Alexa, ask plowz and mowz to plow my driveway”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: plowz and mowz
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Alexa is making on-demand lawn mowing and snow plowing even easier with the PLOWZ & MOWZ skill. You’ll be able to complete some of your most burdensome outdoor chores without lifting a finger!

This skill gives your Alexa-capable devices the ability to check on the status of your orders and book a mow or plow for as soon as the next day. Once the skill is activated, all you need to say is “Alexa, ask plowz and mowz to mow my lawn tomorrow” or “Alexa, ask plowz and mowz to plow my driveway!” It’s that easy!

To enable the PLOWZ & MOWZ skill, you’ll first need to place an order on the mobile app, available for iOS and Android devices, at www.plowzandmowz.com

For more information, visit landing page or email hello@plowz.com

- USA Today says, “Lawn mowing? Snowplowing? There’s an app for that!”
